Introduction C# SQL RPG IV Javascript PHP Python HTML & CSS

Java

Welcome to the Java Page starting out here we have some java terms and how Cameron
defines them in a table.

Term Definition
Class Template used for many things such as constructors, methods, and the 4 pillars
of object oriented programming.
Method Manipulation tool for a application. Use it to change text to uppercase bubble sort
and interact with a program. Examples of how I used methods include a grading scale
or to sort an array alphabetically.
Constructor Special type of function called to create an object. It creates objects using arguments
along with variables that have the proper scope within a class.
Try Catch block Way to dictate error messages as well as print errors if you dislike debugging
depending on the circumstance
Database Organized storage with astronomical size used to hold information electronically
or in other words a far more advanced array.
JavaFX JavaFX is a tool dedicated to creating desktop applications. It uses buttons,
labels, textboxes, and graphs. The list goes on and on and doesn't end.
SQL Programming language that can be integrated to Java and many other programming
languages to provide the power of CRUD(Create read Update Delete) to a database.
J2EE Standing for Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition it is a tool to make desktop
applications just like JavaFX only much more powerful as it is used by Enterprises all
over the world.
Apache Tomcat Java HTTP web server used in conjuction with J2EE.
Threads Way to manipulate how a program is executed.
You can make the thread sleep among a host of many other features.

This moving forward concludes the java table.Moving forward we have documentation on my final exam
I had to program in J2EE to manipulate a database using SQL, and a login. I provide my code in notepad
be
